org.gridlab.gat.io
Interface FileInputStreamInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Monitorable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileInputStreamCpi
public interface FileInputStreamInterface
extends Monitorable

This interface is for internal GAT use only. It has to be public for techinical reasons. All GAT users should use org.gridlab.gat.io.FileInputStream

Author:
rob
